column2: 18.8 Communications: HF Radios If one HF radio is selected for transmission,?
column3: HF Radios If one HF radio is selected for transmission, deselect the other HF radio on all audio select panels to prevent audio interference. Caution: Do not operate HF radios during refueling operations.

column2: 18.8 Communications: Broadband Antenna RF Hazard The BROADBAND SYSTEM switch must be?
column3: Broadband Antenna RF Hazard The BROADBAND SYSTEM switch must be OFF during aircraft de-icing, while in a hangar or if stopped under a skybridge. Caution: Passenger oxygen mask deployment switch is in close proximity to the broadband switch.
